subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Mike Woodson, the Knicks’ interim coach, now has to deal with Amar’e Stoudemire’s newly lacerated hand in addition to a 2-0 deficit against the Heat.
snippet: Mike Woodson, the Knicks’ interim coach, now has to deal with Amar’e Stoudemire’s newly lacerated hand in addition to a 2-0 deficit against the Heat.
